quest_alicia_gift.title: A Sparkly Gift
quest_alicia_gift.description: Alicia wants to give Laura something sparkly to make her happy. She asked you to look for something suitable.

stages.1: You found a Crystal Shard! Bring it back to Alicia.

quest_laura_ring.title: The Golden Band
quest_laura_ring.description: Laura needs a pure gold band from a rare undead in the lower floors for a 'project'.

stages.0: Hunt the undead in the lower floors.
stages.1: You recovered the Gold Band. Return to Laura.
